paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper reports on the KCNH2 gene variants p.T618I and p.K897T, detailing their clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual patient information.

patients.phenotype: Short QT syndrome (SQTS) with varying QT intervals and family history of sudden death

individual_records.phenotype_details: Short QT interval, frequent ventricular ectopic beats, family history of sudden death.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 16-year-old male patient (patient 1) was referred to our institution after the detection of a short QT interval and frequent ventricular ectopic beats on an electrocardiogram (ECG).

individual_records.phenotype_details: ECG with a QT interval of 280 milliseconds and a QTc of 340 milliseconds, no arrhythmias recorded.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The asymptomatic 21-year-old sister of the index case (patient 2) had an ECG with a QT interval of 280 milliseconds and a QTc of 340 milliseconds.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Sudden loss of consciousness, ventricular fibrillation, short QT intervals.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 47-year-old maternal aunt of the 2 siblings (patient 3) experienced a sudden loss of consciousness in a public office.

functional_data.summary: The p.T618I mutation was associated with short QT syndrome and showed poor response to sotalol treatment.

variants.segregation_data: The p.T618I mutation segregates with disease in the family, as evidenced by the family history of sudden deaths.
variants.additional_notes: The presence of the p.K897T polymorphism was also noted but not detailed in terms of penetrance.
key_quotes: Our data do not suggest a clinical efficacy in these patients, neither in prolonging the QT interval to normal values nor in preventing ventricular arrhythmias.
Genetic analysis of the family in our study showed, in addition to the p.T618I mutation, the presence of the p.K897T polymorphism in KCNH2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
